name: withCString(encodedAs:_:)
desc: Calls the given closure with a pointer to the contents of the string, represented as a null-terminated sequence of code units.
declaration: func withCString<Result, TargetEncoding>(encodedAs targetEncoding: TargetEncoding.Type, _ body: (UnsafePointer<TargetEncoding.CodeUnit>) throws -> Result) rethrows -> Result where TargetEncoding : _UnicodeEncoding
